algorithm_technique: Sort the costs and greedily buy the cheapest ice cream bars until coins run out.
problem_summary_simple: Buy the maximum number of ice cream bars given their costs and a budget.
problem_summary_technical: Sort costs and iterate, subtracting costs from coins, to find the maximum count of affordable bars.
key_insights: To maximize the number of items, always pick the cheapest available item first (greedy approach).
Sorting the costs is essential for the greedy strategy.
The problem statement specifically requires using counting sort, but the provided solution uses standard sort.
